original_text: If I had done that, I would not have been faithful to God in heaven. I would have deserved punishment for that sin. If I had done that, I would not have been faithful to God in heaven. I would have deserved punishment for that sin. If I had done that,
korean_text: 그것도 재판에 회부할 죄악이니 내가 그리하였으면 위에 계신 하나님을 속이는 것이리라

sentences.original_text: I would not have been faithful to God in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하늘에 계신 하나님께 faithful 하지 않았을 것이다
나는 그 죄에 대한 벌을 받아 마땅했을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I would not have been faithful to God in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 하늘에 계신 하나님께 faithful 하지 않았을 것이다
